<NEW>

DINOBOT paused.  The SHARKTICONS se=
emed to be barely sentient, but reliant upon a general to give them orders =
ni battle and direct them.  However, the GENERAL seemed to be content to ho=
ld back, and fighting him directly would require simultaneously engaging hi=
m AND his forces.  The DINOBOT of old would have relished such a challenge,=
 but for this new incarnation, 'honor' was the last thing on his processor.=


Going to try and engage the SHARKTICONS group by gruop, attempting to thi=
n down thier numbers with hit and run tactics, counting that the groups wou=
ld be trying to pursue them to just overwhelm with numbers, and thus runnin=
g into one another and messing up their formations with each hit and run at=
tack of his own, trying to thin the herd.

Meanwhile, VICE GRIP was of a di=
fferent mindset, just going to charge in directly over towards SKYBYTE!  Of=
 course, this would lead his charge right through the main cluster of SHARK=
TICONS, and give them a golden opportunity to dogpile (or sharkpile) on him=
..
